dct_description_sm: Schaffmann & Kluge Landkartenverlag. Alternate title: Schaffman plan Berlin. Ancilliary map: Berlin bei Nocht. Diagrams of U-Bahn, S-Bahn. Four insets for map continuation. With attached map of "Zoologischen Garten" area (1:12,500) Legend in German English and French.
